dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: If you bring me back some metal things I can upgrade your abilities

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Come back to me if you find any weird metal objects

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: I see you found a derilect scuba diver's tank. I can fix it up for you, in exchange for a few fish...

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: I see you found an abandoned pair of scuba flippers. I can fix them up for you, in exchange for a few fish...

dialogue.name: Wally
dialogue.text: Are you interested in any of these upgrades?
